house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 7 bedroom(s), 6 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Microwave,Pantry, Trash Compacter
